description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for ROSE-LINK VPN Router

panels.description: Current CPU temperature with min/max over the dashboard time range
panels.title: CPU Temperature

panels.description: Network throughput per interface with capacity threshold line. TX values are inverted for visual symmetry.
panels.title: Network Throughput (Bytes/sec)

panels.description: Bandwidth utilization as percentage of link capacity. Based on selected Link Capacity variable.
panels.title: Bandwidth Utilization (%)

list.description: Interface capacity in Mbps for bandwidth utilization calculation
list.label: Link Capacity (Mbps)
list.name: link_capacity

title: ROSE-LINK Dashboard
